text: Hi, HubSpot offers autoresizing out of the box, just specify the image width: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/files/automatic-image-resizing-on-HubSpot-content>
Hi <@U02GYAXGHJQ>, not an option as I do no serve it in <img> tag, but rather as background image for a div
I see, maybe you can use the img element as a background? Just an idea <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/31267425/use-the-html-img-tag-as-a-background-image-instead-of-the-css-background-image>
